channel.title: [317] RedEssenceScape [317] D CLAWS, PVP, AND MUCH MORE!
channel.description:
[size=30pt]REDESSENCESCAPE - WELCOME![/size]
This is my first development thread so be nice :P
Some features:
- 30% PVP (You don't get random drops but most of the main buildings around varrock are safe) - D Claws - Can hold more than 200 people at a time! (A rough estimate, this is a new comp and super 1337) - No overpowered training! - PKing, it wont take like 20 hours to actually get decent stats and go pking, you can go pking in like, less than an hour but more than 20 mins! - Moneymaking is actually a bit quick, but who said this server is going to be realistic? Quicker PKing! - MUCH MUCH MORE!
[b]Please remember, this is a new server and I will be adding much more![/b]
PICS ARE AT BOTTOM ATTACHED! Some are down here too:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2e5skno.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/b6tspj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/qqvlgx.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9legsp.jpg[/img]
[b]Before attacking[/b]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zf7mh3.jpg[/img]
[b]After killing[/b]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2afy839.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/w37f6.jpg[/img]
[b][size=20pt]currently working on:[/size][/b]
- Better PVP - More items - Range (Mage short doesn't fire :() - Non-CB skills
Thank you so much for reading and I hope you enjoyed! As I said before, Im adding so much to this server and hope to have it really good and release it!!
- Pk3r john
Credits:
80% me :) 20% codexs
[b][size=40pt]WHEN I SAID CLAN WARS IN THE PIC, I MEAN CASTLE WARS! SORRY![/size][/b]

item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[size=30pt]REDESSENCESCAPE - WELCOME![/size]

This is my first development thread so be nice

Some features:

  • 30% PVP (You don’t get random drops but most of the main buildings around varrock are safe)
  • D Claws
  • Can hold more than 200 people at a time! (A rough estimate, this is a new comp and super 1337)
  • No overpowered training!
  • PKing, it wont take like 20 hours to actually get decent stats and go pking, you can go pking in like, less than an hour but more than 20 mins!
  • Moneymaking is actually a bit quick, but who said this server is going to be realistic? Quicker PKing!
  • MUCH MUCH MORE!

Please remember, this is a new server and I will be adding much more!

PICS ARE AT BOTTOM ATTACHED!

  • Non-CB skills

Thank you so much for reading and I hope you enjoyed!
As I said before, Im adding so much to this server and hope to have it really good and release it!!
